Sunhawk arrived and walked to Talos.

Sunhawk (at attention):  I HAVE SET UP A SECOND SENSOR
TO THE SOUTH SIR!  WHAT IS MY NEXT ASSIGNMENT SIR!

--- Jonathan <jhogan@...> wrote:
> rattrap opens a cmm to talos and asks" talos is
> there anything i can do? 
> 
> {Talos}
> 
>     Talos looked at the comm as Rattrap checked in,
> "Rattrap I need someone to inspect the ships outter
> hull for any rents or weakened plates. In case the
> predicons attack I don't want the armor of the ship
> buckling under an initial attack. Mind you just mark
> locations where repairs are needed, we'll worry
> about the actual repairs tomorrow. Once you're done
> inspecting the ship join any other bots in the mess
> hall or get some rest, I want every bot at 100% for
> the days ahead."
>
